meanings.definition: A prearranged combat between two persons, fought with deadly weapons according to an accepted code of procedure.
meanings.sent1: The dueling between the knights was a fierce battle of honor.
meanings.sent2: The dueling at dawn was a tradition among the ancient warriors.
meanings.sent3: The dueling over who gets the last cookie was intense but funny.
meanings.sent4: The dueling of opinions in the meeting was like a clash of swords.
meanings.sent5: The dueling in the story was described with vivid details.

meanings.definition: A conflict between two parties or individuals.
meanings.sent1: The dueling between the siblings over the TV remote was loud.
meanings.sent2: The political dueling during the debate was intense.
meanings.sent3: The dueling for the last piece of cake was comical.
meanings.sent4: The dueling of ideas in the classroom was enlightening.
meanings.sent5: The dueling between the rival teams was exciting to watch.
